function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Content downloaded from unverified source","Impact":"Potential for malware, viruses, or misinformation","Mitigation":"Verify the source and use trusted repositories","Technologies":"Antivirus software, web filtering, source verification tools","People":"Users, researchers, institutions","Owner":"IT departments, research institutions"},{"Description":"Unverified Terms and Conditions","Impact":"Legal issues, copyright infringement","Mitigation":"Review and adhere to verified terms and conditions","Technologies":"Legal review software, terms and conditions verification tools","People":"Users, researchers, institutions","Owner":"Legal departments, research institutions"}]}
